0: "The last quarter, it was just announced, our gross domestic product … was below zero. Who ever heard of this? It's never below zero."
1: "Our real unemployment is anywhere from 18 to 20 percent. Don't believe the 5.6. Don't believe it."
2: "When was the last time you saw a Chevrolet in Japan? It doesn’t exist, folks."
3: Under President Barack Obama, income levels and unemployment numbers "are worse now than just about ever" for African-Americans.
4: "We have 93 million people out of work. They look for jobs, they give up, and all of a sudden, statistically, they're considered employed."
